com.sessionm.api
Interface Config

public interface Config

This interface is used to configure the SessionM SDK. For most applications the default configuration should be sufficient.

Field Summary
static int ORIENTATION_DYNAMIC
          Orientation used for applications that support both landscape and portrait.
static int ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
          Orientation used for applications that only support landscape orientation.
static int ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT
          Orientation used for applications that only support only a portrait orientation.
 
Method Summary
 void enableDebugMode(boolean shouldEnableDebugMode)
          Method for toggling debug logging.
 void setActivityOrientation(int orientation)
          Set the orientation of your application.

setActivityOrientation

void setActivityOrientation(int orientation)
Set the orientation of your application. See ORIENTATION constants for options. This is used when displaying SessionM Activities
